channel.title: Freedom of Information Act on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Freedom of Information Act on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The US Military Is Raking in Millions From On-Base Slot Machines
item.description: The Defense Department operates slot machines on US military bases overseas, raising millions of dollars to fund recreation for troops—and creating risks for soldiers prone to gambling addiction.

item.title: The US Military Is Raking in Millions From On-Base Slot Machines
item.description: The Defense Department operates slot machines on US military bases overseas, raising millions of dollars to fund recreation for troops—and creating risks for soldiers prone to gambling addiction.

item.title: DHS Tells Police That Common Protest Activities Are ‘Violent Tactics’
item.description: DHS is urging law enforcement to treat even skateboarding and livestreaming as signs of violent intent during a protest, turning everyday behavior into a pretext for police action.
